About.Hours & facilities: Open all year (incl school holidays) Mon-Fri 8am-4pm. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals and original records to A3.

About.Access: Access to the archives by appointment only, with at least one week's advance notice stating purpose of research. Access to records not normally available for research can be gained by authorisation from the School Council.

About.Acquisition focus: Records (i.e. photographs, memorabilia, private papers) of Barker College, its staff and students.
